3. See you on [+Wednesday][-the Wednesday].
4. I always listen to [-radio][+the radio] in the morning.
5. Alex goes to work by [+bus][-the bus].

7. Listen! Dennis is playing [-trumpet][+the trumpet].

10. What about going to Australia in [+February][-the February]?

6. Don't be late for {5}.
7. Listen! Dennis is playing {6}.
8. We often see our cousins over {7}.
9. She has never been to {8}

bitmark:
[.multiple-choice-text:bitmark--]
[@id:218400]
[%Nr. 1220]
[!Entscheide, ob du den bestimmten Artikel **the** einsetzen musst oder nicht. Wähle aus den Vorgaben aus.]

1. Last year we visited [+St. Paul's Cathedral][-the St. Paul's Cathedral] and [-Tower][+the Tower].
2. [+Mount Everest][-The Mount Everest] is [+the highest mountain][-highest mountain] on earth.
3. [+Loch Ness][-The Loch Ness] is [-most famous lake][+the most famous lake] in Scotland.
4. [+Most][-The most] children like [+sweets][-the sweets].
5. [-Summer of 2003][+The summer of 2003] was hot and dry.
6. [+Plaza Hotel][-The Plaza Hotel] is on the corner of [+59th Street][-the 59th Street] and [+5th Avenue][-The 5th Avenue] in Manhattan.
7. My sister often stays at [+Uncle Tim's][-the Uncle Tim's].
8. Our friends [-Millers][+the Millers] moved to Florida last August.
9. [+Smog][-The Smog] is a problem in [+big cities][-the big cities].
10. Our children go to [+school][-the school] by [+bus][-the bus].

bit.body:
1. Last year we visited {0} and {1}.
2. {2} is {3} on earth.
3. {4} is {5} in Scotland.
4. {6} children like {7}.
5. {8} was hot and dry.
6. {9} is on the corner of {10} and {11} in Manhattan.
7. My sister often stays at {12}.
8. Our friends {13} moved to Florida last August.
9. {14} is a problem in {15}.
10. Our children go to {16} by {17}.
bit.instruction: Entscheide, ob du den bestimmten Artikel **the** einsetzen musst oder nicht. Wähle aus den Vorgaben aus.

bitmark:
[.multiple-choice-text:bitmark--]
[@id:218401]
[%Nr. 1222]
[!Entscheide, ob du den bestimmten Artikel **the** einsetzen musst oder nicht. Wenn du keinen Artikel einsetzen möchtest, tipp ein **x** in die Lücke.]

Hi John,

I arrived in [+the][-x] USA last Monday. We left [-the][+x] Rome, flew over [-the][+x] Alps and made a quick stop in [-the][+x] London. There we went shopping at [-the][+x] Harrods, visited [+the][-x] Tower and enjoyed a sunny afternoon in [-the][+x] Hyde Park. On the following day we left for [-the][+x] New York. [+the][-x] time on board wasn't boring as there were two films to watch on [+the][-x] monitor. [+the][-x] people on [+the][-x] plane were all [-the][+x] Italian. Before we landed at [-the][+x] JFK airport, we saw [+the][-x] Statue of Liberty, [-the][+x] Ellis Island and [+the][-x] Empire State Building. [+the][-x] hotel I stayed in was on [+the][-x] corner of [-the][+x] 42nd Street and [+the][-x] 5th Avenue. I don't like [+the][-x] hotels very much, but I didn't have [-the][+x] time to rent an apartment.

Please say hello to Peter and Mandy.

Yours,
Peter

bit.body:
Hi John,

I arrived in {0} USA last Monday. We left {1} Rome, flew over {2} Alps and made a quick stop in {3} London. There we went shopping at {4} Harrods, visited {5} Tower and enjoyed a sunny afternoon in {6} Hyde Park. On the following day we left for {7} New York. {8} time on board wasn't boring as there were two films to watch on {9} monitor. {10} people on {11} plane were all {12} Italian. Before we landed at {13} JFK airport, we saw {14} Statue of Liberty, {15} Ellis Island and {16} Empire State Building. {17} hotel I stayed in was on {18} corner of {19} 42nd Street and {20} 5th Avenue. I don't like {21} hotels very much, but I didn't have {22} time to rent an apartment.

Please say hello to Peter and Mandy.

Yours,
Peter
bit.instruction: Entscheide, ob du den bestimmten Artikel **the** einsetzen musst oder nicht. Wenn du keinen Artikel einsetzen möchtest, tipp ein **x** in die Lücke.

5. [-Taj Mahal][+The Taj Mahal] is one of India's most popular attractions.
6. [-Dead Sea][+The Dead Sea] lies below sea level.
7. [+Everglades National Park][-The Everglades National Park] is in Florida.
8. Aconcagua is [-highest mountain][+the highest mountain] outside Asia.
9. [+Mount Fuji][-The Mount Fuji] is one of Japan's __Three Holy Mountains.__
10. [+Lake Superior][-The Lake Superior] is [-largest][+the larges hour t] of [-Great Lakes][+the Great Lakes].

bit.body:
1. {0} is Austria's longest river.
2. Our uncle lives in {1}.
3. {2} belongs to the Carribean islands.
4. {3} was dedicated in 1886.
5. {4} is one of India's most popular attractions.
6. {5} lies below sea level.
7. {6} is in Florida.
8. Aconcagua is {7} outside Asia.
9. {8} is one of Japan's __Three Holy Mountains.__
10. {9} is {10} of {11}.

8. There's [+a][-an][-some] nice girl in the red car.

10. How about [-a][-an][+some] grapes?

10. How about {9} grapes?

10. After this tour you have [-a][-an][+the][-x] whole afternoon free to explore the city.
